title: Lilo and Stitch Skins.
body: ok so what I was thinking was a lilo and stitch skin duo. I was thinking of Illaoi as lilo and gnar as Stitch. what do you guys think? If I get enough positive feedback, I will create some drawings of it. Or, if you have some art, go ahead and post it. Anyways, go ahead and let me know in the comments what you think!

replies.body: I think Lilo would be looking like a fine lady when she grows up.
lilo Karma, Hawaiian Karma is a must.
